items.name: Model Context Protocol (MCP)
items.description: Open standard connecting AI applications to external systems like data sources, tools, and workflows

zh-Hans.name: 模型上下文协议 (MCP)
zh-Hans.description: 将 AI 应用连接到外部系统（如数据源、工具和工作流）的开放标准

items.name: Agent2Agent (A2A)
items.description: Open protocol enabling secure communication and collaboration between AI agents across different platforms

zh-Hans.name: Agent 间通信协议 (A2A)
zh-Hans.description: 支持不同平台之间 AI Agent 安全通信和协作的开放协议

items.name: Agent Payments Protocol (AP2)
items.description: Open protocol for secure agent-led payments using verifiable digital credentials and authorization mandates

zh-Hans.name: Agent 支付协议 (AP2)
zh-Hans.description: 使用可验证数字凭证和授权委托的安全 Agent 支付开放协议

items.name: Agent Network Protocol (ANP)
items.description: Decentralized protocol for trustless agent communication with DID-based identity and automatic protocol negotiation

zh-Hans.name: Agent 网络协议 (ANP)
zh-Hans.description: 基于 DID 身份和自动协议协商的去中心化无信任 Agent 通信协议

items.name: Agent Client Protocol (ACP)
items.description: Open protocol standardizing communication between code editors and coding agents for autonomous code modification

zh-Hans.name: Agent 客户端协议 (ACP)
